Welcome to shared_atomic’s documentation!¶

The module can be used for atomic operations on multiprocessing shared ctypes value and arrays.

The module should be built upon CFFI>1.0, can be loaded dynamically by ctypes.CDLL .

When calling those functions, the adress of the shared variablescould be get by ctypes.byref

For detailed usage of the module, please visit this example.

For api references, please visit api.
